Song.title: Undone
Song.copyright: Â© 2015 Sovereign Grace Worship Music by Pat Sczebel, Words by Pat Sczebel, Kate DeGraide, and Nathan Stiff

Arrangement.text:
INTRO: [C6 Em | D Bm | C6 G | D Bm7 | C6 Em | D Bm | C G | D]
VERSE1: Your [G]Spirit had awakened{,} our l[Gmaj7]ifeless hearts to see The [G6]King in brilliant glory,{,} re[C/G]vealed in majesty We were [G]ruined in Your p[D]resence{,} and t[Em]earing at the s[C]eams Our [G]eyes had gazed upon the King of k[D]ings
CHORUS: We [C6]fall d[Em]own in [D]awe of You [Bm7] We [C6]fall d[G]own und[D]one [Bm7] We [C]fall d[Em]own bef[D]ore you, Lord, [Bm7] un[C]done [G | D]
VERSE 2: Our h[G]ands had crafted idols,{,} our [Gmaj7]lips had spoken lies [G6]Every wayward thought we had{,} a[C/G]gainst us testified But [G]You were rich in m[D]ercy To pro[Em]vide what You de[C]mand And [G]now on Christ, the solid rock, we s[D]tand
BRIDGE: [C]Ho[G]ly, [Em]Ho[D]ly, [C]Ho[G]ly O[D]ne [Bm] [C]Ho[G]ly, [Em]Ho[D]ly, [C]Ho[G]ly O[D]ne, You [Bm]are [C]Ho[G]ly, [Em]Ho[D]ly, [C]Ho[G]ly O[D]ne, You [Bm]are [C]Ho[G]ly, [Em]Ho[D]ly, [C]Ho[G]ly O[D]ne
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse1 your spirit had awakened our lifeless hearts to see the king in brilliant glory revealed in majesty we were ruined in your presence and tearing at the seams our eyes had gazed upon the king of kings chorus we fall down in awe of you we fall down undone we fall down before you lord undone verse 2 our hands had crafted idols our lips had spoken lies every wayward thought we had against us testified but you were rich in mercy to provide what you demand and now on christ the solid rock we stand bridge holy holy holy one holy holy holy one you are holy holy holy one you are holy holy holy one
